suggestions.why: Manual index scan inside loop is O(n). Using Set/Map gives O(1) lookup.
suggestions.energyImpact: Significantly reduces CPU cycles and energy consumption.

suggestions.why: Manual index scan inside loop is O(n). Using Set/Map gives O(1) lookup.
suggestions.energyImpact: Significantly reduces CPU cycles and energy consumption.

suggestions.recommendedDataStructure: Use HashMap/HashSet for matching instead of O(n²) nested scans.
suggestions.why: Nested loops cause O(n²) complexity. Converting one list to a Map reduces time to O(n).
List.get(keyName) implies key-value usage, but lists have no keys. Use a Map instead.
suggestions.energyImpact: Avoids scanning and wrong access patterns.

suggestions.why: List.get(keyName) implies key-value usage, but lists have no keys. Use a Map instead.
suggestions.energyImpact: Avoids scanning and wrong access patterns.

suggestions.pattern: Temporary list created and used once
suggestions.why: Creating large temporary lists wastes memory and CPU. Use streaming or process directly.
suggestions.energyImpact: Avoids memory allocation + garbage collection overhead.
